formElement.documentation: The ID or the name of the Build Definition.
formElement.label: Definition ID or name:

formElement.documentation: The ID or the name of the queue. If not specified, the default queue for the definition will be used.
formElement.label: Queue ID or Name:

formElement.documentation: The branch to build. If not specified, the default branch for the definition will be used.
formElement.label: Source branch:

formElement.documentation: Parameters to pass to the build in key-value form, one pair per line. e.g. 'system.debug="true" BuildConfiguration="debug" BuildPlatform="x64"'. If not specified, the default variables for the definition will be used.
formElement.htmlDocumentation: Parameters to pass to the build in key-value form, one pair per line. e.g. system.debug="true" BuildConfiguration="debug" BuildPlatform="x64". If not specified, the default variables for the definition will be used.
formElement.label: Parameters:

formElement.documentation: Results will be saved into this property/property sheet.
formElement.label: Result Property Sheet:

formElement.documentation: Format to save the request results.
formElement.label: Result Format:
